# isMicrophoneMuted

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the user’s microphone is muted.

## Declaration

```swift
var isMicrophoneMuted: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the user’s microphone is turned off; [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if the user’s speech is being transmitted to remote participants. The default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Adjusting Audio Properties

- **remoteParticipantVolume**: A float that scales the volume of all remote participants.
